body: This issue has been automatically marked as stale due to inactivity and will be closed in 7 days if no further activity occurs. If further support is needed, please provide an update and/or more details.

System information

OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Ubuntu 20.04
ONNX Runtime installed from (source or binary): binary
ONNX Runtime version: 1.12.1
Python version: 3.8.10

can be reproduced using this script:
`
import onnxruntime as ort
import onnx
from onnx import helper
from onnx import TensorProto
import numpy as np

N = 4
padding = [N, 0]
X = helper.make_tensor_value_info('X', TensorProto.FLOAT, [N])
pads = helper.make_tensor('pads', TensorProto.INT64, vals=padding, dims=[2])
Y = helper.make_tensor_value_info('Y', TensorProto.FLOAT, [N+N])

node_def = helper.make_node(
    'Pad',                  # name
    ['X', 'pads'], # inputs
    ['Y'],                  # outputs
    mode='reflect',        # attributes
)
graph_def = helper.make_graph(
    [node_def],        # nodes
    'test-model',      # name
    [X],
    [Y],               # outputs
    [pads]
)
model_def = helper.make_model(graph_def, producer_name='onnx-example')
onnx.checker.check_model(model_def)
print('The model is checked!')
onnx.save_model(model_def, 'pad.onnx')
print('The model is saved!')

x = np.arange(N, dtype=np.float32)
print(f'input={x}')
print(f'padding={padding}')
result = np.pad(x, pad_width=(padding[0], padding[1]), mode='reflect')
print(f'numpy result={result}')

y_ort = ort.InferenceSession("pad.onnx", providers=['CPUExecutionProvider']).run(["Y"], {"X": x})[0]
print(f'onnxrt result={y_ort}')
`

result should be:
`
The model is checked!
The model is saved!
input=[0. 1. 2. 3.]
padding=[4, 0]
numpy result=[2. 3. 2. 1. 0. 1. 2. 3.]
onnxrt result=[0. 3. 2. 1. 0. 1. 2. 3.]
`
